technology.description: Google Analytics offers a host of compelling features and benefits for everyone from senior executives and advertising and marketing professionals to site owners and content developers.
Facebook Pixel is Facebooks conversion tracking system for ads on Facebook to websites.
This website contains tracking information that allows admins to see Facebook Insights out of Facebook to this domain.
Google's primary tag for Google Measurement/Conversion Tracking, Adwords and DoubleClick.
Allows users to Like items they find on the web, similar to how you Like items within Facebook.
The use of a fan page Like box Facebook page integration.
Iconic font and CSS toolkit.
Anti-bot CAPTCHA widget from Google.
This website has images that may have been sourced from Getty Images.
Tag management that lets you add and update website tags without changes to underlying website code.
The Google Font API helps you add web fonts to any web page.
Share this page on Facebook using a deprecated sharing syntax.
This website mentions COVID-19 / Novel Coronavirus.
Adobe Flash Macromedia shockwave content. End of life product retiring in 2020.

ASP.NET is a web application framework marketed by Microsoft that programmers can use to build dynamic web sites, web applications and XML web services. It is part of Microsoft's .NET platform and is the successor to Microsoft's Active Server Pages (ASP) technology.
Application server and framework system.
Launches a web application for Safari on iOS in full-screen mode to look like a native application.
The website contains code that allows the page to support IPhone / Mobile Content.
This page uses the viewport meta tag which means the content may be optimized for mobile content.
This content is formatted for mobile devices, it does not allow the content to be scaled.
The website uses the � symbol on its website - meaning it may accept payment in this Japanese currency.
The website uses the � symbol on its website - meaning it may accept payment in this British currency.
The JW Player has evolved through the history of online video since the time Jeroen wrote the first version in 2005. The experience we have developed over those years are built into the JW Player.
VideoJS is an HTML5 Video Player, built with Javascript and CSS, with a fallback to a Flash video player for when the browser doesn't support HTML5 video. Owned by Brightcove.
Response jQuery Content Slider
The website uses some form of Google APIs to provide interaction with the many API's Google Providers.

JQuery is a fast, concise, JavaScript Library that simplifies how you traverse HTML documents, handle events, perform animations, and add Ajax interactions to your web pages. jQuery is designed to change the way that you write JavaScript.

jQuery UI provides abstractions for low-level interaction and animation, advanced effects and high-level, themeable widgets, built on top of the jQuery JavaScript Library, that you can use to build highly interactive web applications.
A jQuery extension that provides functionality to "ease" things onto or off of the screen.
FancyBox is a tool for displaying images, html content and multi-media in a Mac-style "lightbox" that floats overtop of web page.
HTML5 IE enabling script shim.

JavaScript SDK enables you to access all of the features of the Graph API via JavaScript, and it provides a rich set of client-side functionality for authentication and sharing. It differs from Facebook Connect.
Allows a user to make a website more sociable and connected with integrations from the hugely popular Facebook website.
Modular standard library for JavaScript.
A standardized way to manipulate the browser history via script.
A refreshing JavaScript Datepicker.
A polyfill for ES6-style Promises.
A suite of modular libraries and tools which work together or independently to enable interactive content on open web technologies via HTML5.
Raven.js is the official browser JavaScript client for Sentry.
Twitter Bootstrap JS components.
Fully responsive carousel library.
Magnific Popup is a responsive lightbox & dialog script.
Handlebars provides the power necessary to let you build semantic templates effectively with no frustration.
Lo-dash is an alternative and a drop-in replacement for Underscore.js.
Fullscreen Scrolling Websites Library.
Provides a single JavaScript file that contains everything you will commonly need for animating DOM elements:
vue.js a JavaScript MVVM framework.
DoubleClick enables agencies, marketers and publishers to work together successfully and profit from their digital marketing investments.
Google Publisher Tag (GPT) is an ad tagging format that provides benefits and improvements over the DART tag.
Custom Audiences from your website makes it possible to reach people who visit your website and deliver the right message to them on Facebook.
